board.name: CY8CKIT-040T
board.summary: The PSoC™ 4000T CAPSENSE™ Evaluation Kit enables you to evaluate and develop with Cypress's fifth-generation, low-powerCAPSENSE™ solution using the PSoC™ 4000T device.
board.prov_capabilities: low_power bsp_gen4 lptimer flash_64k msc_touchpad msclp mcu_gp psoc4 capsense serial_led cy8ckit_040t msc_proximity enclosure spi cat2 msc_button sram_8k led i2c
board.description:
Kit Features:
  • World's Most Reliable, Liquid Tolerant, Lowest Power CAPSENSE™ Solution
  • On-board Programmer and Debugger

Kit Contents:
  • CY8CKIT-040T PSoC™ 4000T CAPSENSE™ Evaluation Board with Enclosure
  • USB Type-A to Micro-B cable
  • Quick Start Guide
